content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I tried to clone the repository from 'https://www.rosettastone.com/' to '/path/to/rosetta/stone/', but received an error message stating that the destination path already exists and is not an empty directory. As instructed, I sent a command to execute the shell with arguments to run the file '/path/to/rosetta/stone/setup.exe' using wine."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"wine: cannot find \'/path/to/rosetta/stone/setup.exe\'\\n"'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/path/to/rosetta/stone/download"}}}'}]
"""
